content.text:
# Walcot and Park North (ward)

Walcot and Park North is an electoral ward in the Borough of Swindon, England. Since 2012, the ward has elected three councillors to Swindon Borough Council.
History
The ward was created in 2012. It is considered a safe Labour ward.
Geography
The ward covers the areas of Walcot and Park North. The ward is part of the Swindon South parliamentary constituency.
Demographics
In the 2021 census, the population of the ward was 13,711.
References
See also
* List of electoral divisions and wards in Wiltshire
